content: this dishcloth can be made in any size with any weight yarn make sure to choose a hook that is appropriately sized for your yarn if using something other than the pattern calls for i designed this pattern to help support www eachstitchcounts org the mission of each stitch counts is to alleviate hygiene insecurity by providing food pantries with dish and laundry detergent containers of dish detergent include a handmade dishcloth donated by crafter volunteers households dealing with food insecurity often deal with hygiene insecurity we reach this community by supplying these products please consider making some dishcloths and donating them with a bottle of dish soap to a food pantry near you however each stitch counts gladly accepts donations of your handiwork and will distribute them with a bottle of soap
